text: Sir Mekere Morauta, KCMG (12 June 1946 â€“ 19 December 2020) was a Papua New Guinean politician and economist. He was the 7th Prime Minister of Papua New Guinea from 1999 to 2002. Morauta was born in Kukipi, Territory of Papua. Morauta was a member of the People's Democratic Movement. Morauta died on 19 December 2020 in Brisbane, Queensland, Australia. He was 74. ==Related pages== *List of scientists from Oceania ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of Papua New Guinea Category:Economists
title: Mekere Morauta
